trends: There have been no other sightings in exit 8 off interstate 9
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: lights coming out of bottom and a hugh display of lights on the left side
divs: Sighting Detailsi was heading south on interstate 95 , when near exit 8 in rhode island , on the left i saw a hugh lighted craft floating , while lights from the bottom scanned the ground. oddly because it was at night i couldn't make out the entire shape , i say oddly because the three corners that were visible to me reminded me of the old cars they called roadsters where the wheels were protruded and had a mental covering. i continued on my way. i would have pulled over but it was very dark and the highway was too busy for me to make a quick stop.
